Frequently Asked Questions About Kids' Fish & Chips

Is kids' fish & chips a healthy option?
Yes. When prepared with fresh fish, light batter, and balanced sides, it offers protein and nutrients suitable for children.
What types of fish are safest and most popular for children?
Mild white fish like cod, snapper, or local sustainable catches are ideal, as they are easy to chew and low in bones.
Can fish & chips be made allergy-friendly for kids?
Yes. The Club Bali can accommodate common allergies by adjusting the batter or offering alternative sides, ensuring a safe dining experience.
